title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Activity-Based Teacher Training Program for Science Instructional Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can create instructional plans integrating behaviorist and constructivist approaches when designing science lessons.

Learners will incorporate peer feedback (≥3 rounds) to develop AI-based activity materials (e.g., quizzes, simulations) as a smartphone app (Thunkable or App Inventor), then conduct feasibility testing with ≥5 real learners, achieving a usability score of 4.0+/5.0.
Learners can apply questioning techniques to induce cognitive engagement in at least three simulated lessons, achieving over 80% learner participation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
